category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MPP_ToolActivity_CustomUserData
preference.preference_description:
Define user customizable attributes that can be synchronized between NX-CAM and Teamcenter. Up to 15 custom properties can be defined that are stored with the MENCToolActivity of a CAM setup.
Valid values are in the format "pm0UserData[Custom Property Number]:[MOM Variable]:[Display Name]", where: - "[Custom Property Number]" is a two digit number in the range of 01 .. 15. - "[MOM Variable]" is the Manufacturing Output Manager (MOM) variable that is set in the NX-CAM TCL post processor (no spaces allowed). - "[Display Name]" is the display name that will be used as a label for the user defined attribute in the activities table.
Example definition of two user defined tool activity attributes: pm0UserData01:mom_tool_name:Tool Description pm0UserData02:mom_magazine:Magazine Position
Note: The support of user defined attributes must be activated using the preference MPP_ToolActivity_EnableUserData.
